question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. PUSA BETAKESARI - CAULIFLOWER
  2. PUSA MADHURIMA - MUSK MELON
  3. PUSA RAUNAK - WATERMELON
  Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation:
All of the above given pairs are correctly matched
The above given varieties of crops have been recently released by the Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI).
